metadata.Title: CVE-2021-4197 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: An unprivileged write to the file handler flaw in the Linux kernel'scontrol groups and namespaces subsystem was found in the way users haveaccess to some less privileged process that are controlled by cgroups andhave higher privileged parent process. It is actually both for cgroup2 andcgroup1 versions of control groups. A local user could use this flaw tocrash the system or escalate their privileges on the system.
